title: Jabra Halo Fusion - Your calls. Your music. One headset.
description:
Jabra Halo Fusion Wireless is the Bluetooth® headset that takes calls and music to the next level, in one easy-to-use solution with a comfortable wearing style.

For more information visit:
http://www.jabra.com/halofusion
